page.title: 10NICOLA CROSS,AGE 11,UNSTONE.
page.content: "I have to get up at about 8:30. Breakfast is toast & marmite. I walk about 150 m.to the Jnr. School, by 8:50. We play in the yard till 9:00. "The first thing we do is to have an assembly. We sing a hymn and hear a story. In maths we work from a book, Fletcher Bk.6, in my case, or Geometry Two. Today we have drawn circles and ellipses using drawing pins and loops of thread. "We have 15 min. play at 10:45. On Wednesdays, a radio lesson,"Singing Together" lasts 20 min. Then we may do Checkpoint Geography or T.V. History. "I serve school dinners. Today we had ravioli, chips, peas & carrots. Cost 45 pence. After lunch we read or write stories in "Our Books", till 2:00 when the bus takes us to Dronfield Sports Centre for swimming. Return 3:30, home at 3:45."
